# La Villa Coliving

> Premium furnished all-inclusive coliving, 20 minutes from Geneva (French side).

## Key Facts
- 29 furnished rooms across 3 houses (La Villa, Le Loft, Le Lodge)
- Location: Ville-la-Grand, Ambilly, Annemasse (Haute-Savoie, France)
- Price: 1,380 to 1,490 CHF/month, all-inclusive
- Target: Swiss cross-border workers, expats, young professionals
- Amenities: heated pool, sauna, gym, fiber internet, coworking, yoga
- 12-month leases, flat-rate charges included (cleaning 2x/week, streaming, fiber WiFi, sports classes)
- Community of 29 residents, regular events (pizza nights, yoga classes, afterworks)
- 99% occupancy rate over 5 years

## Properties
- La Villa: 10 rooms, Ville-la-Grand — heated pool, sauna, gym. Tram 20 min to Geneva center.
- Le Loft: 7 rooms, Ambilly — industrial design, garden, pool. Lancy-Bachet tram 5 min away.
- Le Lodge: 12 rooms, Annemasse — largest house, rooftop, pool. Léman Express station 10 min away.

## Benefits for Cross-Border Workers
- Rent 30-50% cheaper than a studio in Geneva
- French tax address (cross-border worker advantages)
- All-inclusive = no hidden fees, no utility deposit
- International community, help with settling in
